channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Display and Peripheral Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Display and Peripheral Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-22452|2024-03-04T13:08:03.515Z -- Dell -- Dell Display and Peripheral Manager
item.description: Dell Display and Peripheral Manager for macOS prior to 1.3 contains an improper access control vulnerability. A low privilege user could potentially exploit this vulnerability by modifying files in the installation folder to execute arbitrary code, leading to privilege escalation.
